faq.question: What motivates you?
faq.answer: My curiosity is unsatiatable. I love learning as much as I can with and from passionate people and giving back to my community in any way that I can.

faq.question: What are some of your hobbies?
faq.answer: Strategy and board games, building tools and legos, and exploring new restaurants or areas are all things I love doing just to name a few!

faq.question: Why are you interested in data science/technology?
faq.answer: I've always been fascinated by how the world works and realized early on that data and experiences shape many decisions today. By harnessing technology and data science, we can drive meaningful impact for humanity and the world.

faq.question: What’s the most interesting place you’ve traveled to?
faq.answer: I traveled to Japan for my college graduation trip, and getting immersed in the culture while putting my Japanese skills to the test was incredible. The food, the atmosphere, the people, even the animals were amazing. I can’t wait to go back!

faq.question: If you weren’t working in tech, what would you be doing?
faq.answer: If you've ever watched those videos of people living in the woods, building tools and homes from scratch—yeah, that’s totally where you'd find me!

faq.question: Dogs or Cats?
faq.answer: While I believe both have their perks, I am decidedly a dog person.
